Package com.raihanMuhammadIhsanJBusAF.controller

Class BusController

java.lang.Object
com.raihanMuhammadIhsanJBusAF.controller.BusController
All Implemented Interfaces:
BasicGetController<Bus>
@RestController @RequestMapping("/bus") public class BusController extends Object implements BasicGetController<Bus>
Controller class for handling operations related to buses. Includes methods for creating buses, adding schedules, and retrieving bus information.

    • create

      @PostMapping("/create") public BaseResponse<Bus> create(@RequestParam int accountId, @RequestParam String name, @RequestParam int capacity, @RequestParam List<Facility> facilities, @RequestParam BusType busType, @RequestParam int price, @RequestParam int stationDepartureId, @RequestParam int stationArrivalId)
      Endpoint for creating a new bus.
      Parameters:
      accountId - The ID of the account associated with the bus.
      name - The name of the bus.
      capacity - The capacity of the bus.
      facilities - The list of facilities available on the bus.
      busType - The type of the bus (e.g., SLEEPER, EXECUTIVE).
      price - The price of the bus.
      stationDepartureId - The ID of the departure station.
      stationArrivalId - The ID of the arrival station.
      Returns:
      A BaseResponse containing information about the success or failure of the operation.

    • addSchedule

      @PostMapping("/addSchedule") public BaseResponse<Bus> addSchedule(@RequestParam int busId, @RequestParam String time)
      Endpoint for adding a schedule to an existing bus.
      Parameters:
      busId - The ID of the bus to which the schedule will be added.
      time - The timestamp representing the schedule time.
      Returns:
      A BaseResponse containing information about the success or failure of the operation.

    • getMyBus

      @GetMapping("/getMyBus") public List<Bus> getMyBus(@RequestParam int accountId)
      Endpoint for retrieving a list of buses associated with a specific account.
      Parameters:
      accountId - The ID of the account.
      Returns:
      A list of buses associated with the specified account.

    • getBus

      @GetMapping("/getBus") public Bus getBus(@RequestParam int busId)

      Parameters:
      busId - The ID of the bus.
      Returns:
      Information about the specified bus.

      @GetMapping("/getAllBus") public List<Bus> getAllBus()
